Flow.description: This Flow supports employees abilities to submit questions, bugs, feature requests, and upcoming sprint requests to the department leaders or Revenue Ops Team.

screens.description: This page asks for the specific details related to the issue.
screens.name: Bug_Details
screens.label: Bug Details

fields.name: Issue_Details_Head
fields.fieldText:
Report a Bug: Details

Please fill out the following details as specific as you can. The more details you provide will aid the Revenue Operations Team to resolve your issue.

fields.name: Subject_Issue
fields.fieldText: Subject

fields.name: The_Issue
fields.fieldText: What is the issue you are experiencing?

fields.name: Steps_to_Replicate
fields.fieldText: What are the steps to replicate the issue?

fields.name: Is_your_issue_related_to_a_specific_record
fields.fieldText: Is your issue related to a specific record?

fields.name: Which_Record_Explanation_Issue
fields.fieldText:
Which Record:


Provide as much detail as possible or the direct link.


Details should include:

  1. Which object : Lead, Opportunity, Contact, Account, Enrollment Record, etc.
  2. Name or email on record
  3. Record number if Invoice or Enrollment Record.

fields.name: What_Salesforce_Object
fields.fieldText: What Salesforce Object(s)?

fields.name: Which_Record_Bug
fields.fieldText: Which Record?

fields.name: Document_Upload_Next_Screen
fields.fieldText:
Screenshot/Document Upload:


On the next page you will be able to upload any screenshots or supporting documentation you wish to provide to help us understand the issue you are experiencing.

screens.description: This page displays confirmation of the case submissions.
screens.name: Bug_Thank_You_Page
screens.label: Bug - Thank You Page

fields.name: Thank_You_Issue
fields.fieldText:
Your Bug Has Been Submitted


Your Bug has been submitted to the Revenue Operations Team. We will get back to you as quickly as possible. Please do not resubmit this issue if it's urgent and you did not set the Priority to High update your case so that Priority is High.

fields.name: Upload_Issue_Documents
fields.fieldText:
Add a Screenshot or Document Upload:


Please upload any screenshots or other documents you think will help us understand the issue you are facing.

screens.description: This page displays confirmation of the case submissions.
screens.name: Feature_Request_Thank_You_Page
screens.label: Feature Request - Thank You Page

fields.name: Thank_You_Issue_0
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for submitting your feature request.


Your feature request has been submitted to your department leadership. They will review, determine prioritization, and what gets forwarded to Revenue Operations for future implementation.

screens.description: This page asks for the specific details related to the idea.
screens.name: New_Feature_Details
screens.label: New Feature Details

fields.name: Idea_Details_Head
fields.fieldText:
New Feature Request: Details


Here is the format we use to collect requirements:


As a < type of user >, I want < some goal > so that < some reason >.


This helps the Revenue Operations Team understand who, what the goal is, and why. It can provide specific or vague details with enough information so the Revenue Operations Team can work with the business to determine the best way to reach the goal.


Specific Feature Request Example:

As a Student Success Manager, I want a Case created when a student submits the Semester Withdrawal Form, so I can respond promptly with outreach and/or to process the request.


Vague Feature Request Example:

As a Student Success Manager, I want to be notified when a student requests to withdrawal, so I can address the request promptly.


Either of those examples provides enough detail to get the ball rolling .

fields.name: Subject_Feature_Request
fields.fieldText: Subject

fields.name: As_a_FeatureRequest
fields.fieldText: As a...

fields.name: I_want_FeatureRequest
fields.fieldText: I want...

fields.name: So_that_FeatureRequest
fields.fieldText: So that...

fields.name: Additional_Details_FeatureRequest
fields.fieldText: Please provide any additional details or explanation you think would be beneficial.

fields.name: Provide_ROI_FeatureRequest
fields.fieldText: Do you want to provide an ROI?

fields.name: ROI_Type_FeatureRequest
fields.fieldText: What is the primary focus/type of your ROI

fields.name: ROI_Explanation_FeatureRequest
fields.fieldText: Please provide an explanation of how your ROI will be calculate/determined.

fields.name: NewHireRequest_Description
fields.fieldText:
New Hire Request: Details

Use this form to submit a new hire request to the Revenue Operations team.


The systems Revenue Operations supports are:

  • Salesforce
  • AirCall
  • HeyMarket
  • Calendly

You will need each new hires Verto email address to fill out this form.


Please note, AirCall & HeyMarket turn around time is 3-5 business days.

fields.name: Department_New_Hire_Request
fields.fieldText: Which Department will the new hire(s) work in?

fields.name: Which_Role_NewHireRequest
fields.fieldText: Which Role will the new hire(s) perform?

fields.name: NumOfNewHires_New_Hire_Request
fields.fieldText: How many new hires?

fields.name: Start_Date_of_new_hires
fields.fieldText: Start Date of new hires?

fields.name: New_Hire_Names
fields.fieldText: New Hire Names
fields.helpText: Input all new hire first and last names. Separate each one with a ; (semicolon).

fields.name: New_Hire_Verto_Emails
fields.fieldText: New Hire Verto Emails
fields.helpText: Input the full Verto email address for each new hire. Separate each one with a ; (semicolon).

fields.name: Preference_for_location_of_AirCall_number
fields.fieldText: Preference for location of AirCall number?
fields.helpText: If there is a preference from where the AirCall number is from please provide details (ex. New York, NY). If no preference is provided the default will be Portland, OR.

screens.description: This page displays confirmation of the case submissions.
screens.name: New_Hire_Request_Thank_You_Page
screens.label: New Hire Request - Thank You Page

fields.name: Thank_You_Issue_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for submitting your new hire request.


Your new hire request has been submitted to the Revenue Operations team. We will process your request taking the start date you provided in mind.

screens.name: Not_Approved_to_Submit_Sprint_Request
screens.label: Not Approved to Submit Sprint Request

fields.name: Not_Approved_Message
fields.fieldText:
Upcoming Sprint Request: Please use Feature Request.


Only department leaders are allowed to submit requests for an upcoming sprints. Please use the Feature Request option to submit your idea or talk to your department leadership to see if they will submit your idea using Upcoming Sprint Requests.

screens.description: This page displays confirmation of the case submissions.
screens.name: Questions_Thank_You_Page
screens.label: Questions - Thank You Page

fields.name: Thank_You_Questions
fields.fieldText:
Your Question Has Been Submitted


Thank you for submitting your question. Verto's Management Team and the Revenue Ops Team will work to answer your questions as quickly as possible. Please do not resubmit this question, if it's urgent and you did not set the Priority to High update your case so that the Priority is High.

screens.description: This screen will determine what time of Revenue Operations Case the user is trying to submit.
screens.name: Revenue_Ops_Case
screens.label: Revenue Ops Case

fields.name: Technology_Case_Welcome
fields.fieldText:
This form will walk you through submitting questions, bugs, feature requests, upcoming sprint requests, or new hire requests to the Revenue Operations team.


The more information and details you can provide the better we will be able to support you and exceed your expectations.


*Only Department Leadership can submit Upcoming Sprint Requests.

fields.name: What_can_we_help_you_with
fields.fieldText: What can we help you with?

fields.name: Bug_Screen1
fields.fieldText:
Report a Bug: Your Information

Please fill out the following with as much detail as you can. The more details you can provide will aid the Revenue Operations Team to resolve your issue.

fields.name: What_is_your_department_Issue
fields.fieldText: What is your department?

fields.name: Which_technology_system_is_your_issue_related_to
fields.fieldText: Which technology system is your issue related to?

fields.name: Which_FormStack_Form
fields.fieldText: Which FormStack Form

fields.name: Priority_Explanation_Issue
fields.fieldText:
﻿What is the priority of your issue?


High = You cannot move forward with your tasks until it is resolved.


Medium = Important but I can do other tasks while I wait for it to get resolved.


Low = There is a workaround and it does not stop me from doing my job but still needs to be resolved.

fields.name: Priority_Issue
fields.fieldText: Priority

fields.name: Revenue_Ops_Feature_Request_Screen1
fields.fieldText:
New Feature Request: Your Information

Please complete this form with as much detail as possible. Your Feature Request will route to your department's leadership team first for review.


If your request is passed on to the Revenue Operations Team we will work with the primary stakeholders to groom all requirements to ensure that everyone is clear on what is to be implemented.

fields.name: What_is_your_department_FeatureRequest
fields.fieldText: What is your department?

fields.name: Which_technology_system_is_the_main_focus_of_your_FeatRqst
fields.fieldText: Which technology system is the main focus of your idea?

fields.name: New_Update_Form_YesNo_FeatureRequest
fields.fieldText: Do you need a new form or updates made to an existing form?

fields.name: Which_FormStack_Form_FeatureRequest
fields.fieldText: Which FormStack Form

fields.name: Priority_Explanation_Issue_0
fields.fieldText:
﻿What is the priority of your issue?


High = Must Have. Mission Critical.


Medium = Nice to Have


Low = Dream. No rush needed.

fields.name: Priority_FeatureRequest
fields.fieldText: Priority

fields.name: Technology_Question_Form
fields.fieldText:
Question:

Please fill out the fields below as much detail as you can. Your question will first route to your management team and if necessary your manager can escalate it to the Revenue Operations Team.

fields.name: What_is_your_department_Question
fields.fieldText: What is your department?

fields.name: Which_technology_system_Question
fields.fieldText: Which technology system?

fields.name: Priority_Explanation_Question
fields.fieldText:
﻿What is the priority for you to get your questions answered?


High = You cannot move forward with your tasks until it is answered.


Medium = Important but I can do other tasks while I wait.


Low = Does not stop me from doing any tasks.

fields.name: Priority_Question
fields.fieldText: Priority

fields.name: Subject_Question
fields.fieldText: Subject

fields.name: Your_Question
fields.fieldText: Your Question

fields.name: Is_your_question_related_to_a_specific_record_Question
fields.fieldText: Is your question related to a specific record?

fields.name: Related_Record_Instructions_Question
fields.fieldText:
Which Record:


Provide as much detail as possible or the direct link.


Details should include:

  1. Which object : Lead, Opportunity, Contact, Account, Enrollment Record, etc.
  2. Name or email on record
  3. Record number if Invoice or Enrollment Record.

fields.name: Which_Salesforce_Object_Question
fields.fieldText: Which Salesforce Object(s)?

fields.name: Which_Record_Question
fields.fieldText: Which Record
fields.helpText: Provide as much detail about a record (name, email) or the specific link to the record.

fields.name: Upcoming_Sprint_Request_User_Info
fields.fieldText:
Upcoming Sprint Request: Your Information

Please complete this form with as much detail as possible. The Revenue Operations Team will work with you to groom this upcoming sprint request after submission to ensure that everyone is clear on what is to be implemented and to determine prioritization.

fields.name: What_is_your_department_UpcomingSprint
fields.fieldText: What is your department?

fields.name: Which_technology_system_is_the_main_focus_of_your_UpcomingSprint
fields.fieldText: Which technology system is the main focus of your idea?

fields.name: Which_FormStack_Form_UpcomingSprint

fields.name: Priority_Explanation_Issue_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
﻿What is the priority of your issue?


High = Must Have. Mission Critical.


Medium = Nice to Have


Low = Dream. No rush needed.

fields.name: Priority_Idea_UpcomingSprint
fields.fieldText: Priority

screens.description: This page asks for the specific details related to the idea.
screens.name: Upcoming_Sprint_Request_Details_Collection_Page
screens.label: Upcoming Sprint Request Details Collection Page

fields.name: Upcoming_Sprint_Request_Details
fields.fieldText:
Upcoming Sprint Request: Details


Here is the format we use to collect requirements:


As a < type of user >, I want < some goal > so that < some reason >.


This helps the Revenue Operations Team understand who, what the goal is, and why. It can provide specific or vague details with enough information so the Revenue Operations Team can work with the business to determine the best way to reach the goal.


Specific Feature Request Example:

As a Student Success Manager, I want a Case created when a student submits the Semester Withdrawal Form, so I can respond promptly with outreach and/or to process the request.


Vague Feature Request Example:

As a Student Success Manager, I want to be notified when a student requests to withdrawal, so I can address the request promptly.


Either of those examples provides enough detail to get the ball rolling .

fields.name: Thank_You_Issue_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for submitting your upcoming sprint request.


Your upcoming sprint request has been submitted to the Revenue Operations team. We will contact you to review, groom, determine prioritization.
